description.@en: A golden torrent sprays from your mouth, rendering another nostalgic and blithesome.

effect.@en: After successfully casting this spell, the foe you touch must Resist with a successful Coordination Test or be made Euphoric. While Euphoric, a foe must succeed at a Resolve Test before taking any action, ever. Only by succeeding at three successful Resolve Tests will the Euphoric condition end.

criticalSuccess.@en: As above, but the spell affects all foes in a Cone Template instead.

criticalFailure.@en: Your body is made wet, smelling of piss and pipesmoke. The stench clings to you for the next 48 hours, unable to be washed away. Those who stand within a Burst Template of you cannot add their Apprentice or Journeyman Ranks to any Skill Test.

system.distance: Any one person you can touch
